name: Adam's Polishes Black Trim Restorer (4 oz with Applicator) - Restores Plastic Trim to a Rich, Black Color with a Factory New Appearance, Lasts Several Months Per Treatment
short_description: ✅ RESULTS THAT LAST - Black Trim Restorer is a game-changer for those plastics that just don't seem to want to get perfect again, and it will last a few months per application too! You're going to love this product, 110% satisfaction guaranteed!

✅ EASY WIPE & DRY APPLICATION - Applying is simple and easy - pour a few drops onto the red applicator pad, and carefully spread it across the trim piece in a nice even motion. Work the product in thoroughly and allow to dry for several hours. Then take an Edgeless Utility Towel and wipe away any excess residue afterward. In most cases there will not be any residue, but if you apply too heavily, there may be some excess that needs to be wiped away.

✅ LASTS SEVERAL MONTHS PER TREATMENT - Adam's Black Trim Restorer is a temporary dye coloring to bring back a nice dark color to faded exterior trim pieces. Black Trim Restorer applies easily with a Microfiber Applicator Pad, or our Ceramic Coating Applicator, which works great for tighter spots. You will want to make sure the trim is as clean as possible before applying this product, so we would recommend wiping it down thoroughly with Eco All Purpose Cleaner or Tire & Rubber Cleaner first.

✅ WHY CHOOSE ADAM'S FOR YOUR AUTO DETAILING PROJECT - Sometimes exterior trim becomes so faded that constant exposure from the sun can cause the trim to dry out and begin to lose the color pigmentation in the plastic. In such cases, our VRT - Vinyl, Rubber, Trim dressing may not be able to fully bring back a deep, rich color to the plastics. This is where Adam's Black Trim Restorer will be necessary.

✅ 110% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Proudly crafted in the USA, this state of the art restoration product. This product is specially designed using the most advanced technologies available. We pride ourselves on customer service and satisfaction and believe that this is THE BEST Black Restorer for Vinyl, Trim, Plastic and Rubber on the market! If you don’t agree, we’ll do everything we can to make it right.

Deep Penetration: Our black car plastic restorer automotive's gentle formula penetrates deep into plastic, repairing micro-cracks and preventing drying and brittleness, extending the life of plastic parts.

product_description: Restore your car's original shine with just a few simple care steps! Our black plastic renovator is more than just a concealer; it's a deep-conditioning treatment. Its unique formula penetrates the plastic's surface, replenishing components lost due to aging and restoring its deep, black luster from the inside out. More importantly, it forms an invisible protective shield, slowing the aging process and keeping the renovated parts looking like new for longer. Instructions 1. Thoroughly clean and dry the plastic parts you want to renovate. 2. Shake the bottle thoroughly for 20-30 seconds before use to ensure even distribution. 3. Pour the black plastic restorer onto the included sponge and apply evenly to the plastic surface. 4. Allow the black plastic restorer to sit on the surface for 3-5 minutes to fully absorb. 5. For best results, allow the product to cure for at least an hour. Precautions 1. Before first use, test the product on a small, inconspicuous area. 2. Apply in a well-ventilated area, avoiding direct sunlight or high-temperature surfaces. 3. Wear gloves during application and avoid contact with untreated surfaces. If accidentally contaminated, wipe off immediately. 4. Store in a cool, dry place away from sources of fire and heat.
